title: Sabaduri Forest
about: Sabaduri Forest is located in the Mtskheta-Mtianeti region, on the territory of Mtskheta and Tianeti municipalities and is part of Tbilisi National Park. Tbilisi National Park is the first national park in Georgia. It was established in 1973 and is located on the Saguramo-Yalno ridge of the southern slopes of the main ridge of the Caucasus and on the slopes of their branches at an altitude of 600-1,700 m above sea level. Tourist infrastructure, sites for picnic, camp and to lit a fire are arranged in Sabaduri forest. Information boards are also placed.
